name: Teakwood Capital
overview: Teakwood Capital, a Dallas, Texas private equity firm, provides unparalleled resources and experience to support management teams in buying and building companies. The Firm invests equity capital primarily in businesses with $500,000 to $3.0 million of EBITDA. Teakwood focuses on management buyouts as well as growth equity investments in companies in Texas and neighboring states.

milestones.description: Texas Private Equity Firm Teakwood Capital Acquires Clockwork Solutions
